description:
Look at these two!!! Then, they’ll say if we do not comply, our children will not be able to attend school, nor will we be able to return to work. Then, our children will be labeled neglected and parents will be labeled health risks and inadequate guardians. Then, they will have “grounds” to take our children. Why do you think I kept on screaming, “INFORMED CONSENT MATTERS,” when I almost lost custody of my two children for following through with my birthing plan, last August? They’re coming for the rest of us. Blacks, Latinos, Whites, you name it! As we know, though, the black body is the first in line. FOH! We either stand as one, or we fall as a whole! 💪🏽
